headline: Do Executive Departures Test Global Payments' (GPN) Governance Strength Or Validate Its Succession Planning?
summary: Global Payments Inc. disclosed that Senior Executive Vice President and Chief Administrative Officer David Green resigned for good reason on January 9, 2026, and that Chief Accounting Officer David Sheffield plans to retire effective March 1, 2026, while both support short-term transition efforts. These leadership changes come as Global Payments is being closely watched for its execution quality and integration track record, making governance and continuity particularly important for...

headline: Reasons Why You Should Retain Fiserv Stock in Your Portfolio
summary: FISV is leveraging SaaS adoption, upgraded payment platforms and strategic acquisitions to drive steady revenue growth in 2026.

headline: After Plunging 10.6% in 4 Weeks, Here's Why the Trend Might Reverse for Global Payments (GPN)
summary: Global Payments (GPN) has become technically an oversold stock now, which implies exhaustion of the heavy selling pressure on it. This, combined with strong agreement among Wall Street analysts in revising earnings estimates higher, indicates a potential trend reversal for the stock in the near term.

headline: Planview Enters 2026 with New Leadership and Continued AI Innovation
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, January 21, 2026--Planview today announced strong 2025 momentum, driven by significant customer growth, AI innovation, and industry recognition throughout the year.

headline: Powering Business Growth: Regions Bank Selects Worldpay to Transform Business Payments
summary: BIRMINGHAM, Ala., January 21, 2026--Regions Bank on Wednesday announced a major collaboration with payments technology company Worldpay®, a Global Payments company. This new collaboration is designed to enhance how Regions’ business clients, ranging from small businesses to major enterprises, accept payments and manage cash flow operations.

headline: US Payments Forum Announces 2026 Steering Committee
summary: Group includes payment industry veterans from top organizations who will lead Forum prioritiesREDWOOD CITY, Calif., Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The U.S. Payments Forum today announced its 2026 Steering Committee and officers, a leadership group comprised of industry representatives from across the payments value chain.
